activity_daily: ${name} is training for an upcoming marathon and ${verb} every day without fail to stay fit. Each day, ${subject} ${verb} ${sessions} laps around the park, and each lap is ${per_session} ${units} long. After ${days} days of dedicated training, how many ${units} has ${name} ${verb_past} in total?

For exercise and to stay healthy, ${name} ${verb} ${sessions} times per day, covering ${per_session} ${units} each time. How many ${units} will ${subject} have ${verb_past} after ${days} days of this routine?

${name} has a daily ${activity} routine to improve ${his_her} health and fitness. ${subj} ${verb} ${sessions} rounds of ${per_session} ${units} each. After doing this consistently for ${days} days, how many total ${units} ${has_have} ${subject} covered?

Every day without fail, ${name} ${verb} ${sessions} sets of ${per_session} ${units} each as part of ${his_her} training program. If ${subject} keep${verb_s} this up for ${days} days, how many ${units} will ${subject} have ${verb_past} altogether?
care_weekly: ${name} volunteers at an animal shelter where ${subject} take${verb_s} care of ${count} ${things} that need attention. Each ${thing_singular} requires ${hours} hours of care per day. How many hours does ${name} spend caring for the ${things} in one week?

${name} has ${count} ${things} at home that ${subject} look${verb_s} after with great care and dedication. Each one needs ${hours} hours of attention every day. How many hours per week does ${name} spend on ${his_her} ${things}?

As a dedicated caretaker at the local sanctuary, ${name} is responsible for ${count} ${things} that depend on ${him_her}. ${subj} spend${verb_s} ${hours} hours daily on each one. What is the total number of hours ${subject} work${verb_s} in a week?

${name} recently adopted ${count} ${things} from a rescue center and wants to give them the best care possible. Each ${thing_singular} needs ${hours} hours of daily care. How many hours does ${name} spend on them over the course of a week?
practice: ${name} is learning to play ${skill} and is determined to become really good at it. ${subj} practice${verb_s} ${sessions} times every day, with each practice session lasting ${per_session} minutes. After ${days} days of dedicated practice, how many minutes has ${name} spent practicing?

To improve at ${skill}, ${name} practices ${sessions} times daily for ${per_session} minutes each session because ${subject} want${verb_s} to get better. How many total minutes of practice will ${subject} have after ${days} days?

${name} takes ${skill} lessons from a professional teacher every week and practices ${sessions} times a day at home. Each practice is ${per_session} minutes long. After ${days} days of this routine, how many minutes ${has_have} ${subject} practiced in total?

Every day, ${name} dedicates time to ${skill} practice because ${subject} dream${verb_s} of performing on stage someday. ${subj} ${does_do} ${sessions} sessions of ${per_session} minutes each. How many minutes will ${subject} have practiced after ${days} days?
work_output: ${name}'s ${worker} produces ${items} in batches throughout the day at ${his_her} facility. It makes ${sessions} batches per day, with ${per_session} ${items} in each batch. How many ${items} will it produce in ${days} days?

At ${name}'s factory on the industrial side of town, the ${worker} runs ${sessions} cycles daily, producing ${per_session} ${items} per cycle. After ${days} days of operation, how many ${items} will have been made?
The ${worker} that ${name} operates at ${his_her} business makes ${sessions} batches of ${per_session} ${items} each day. Over ${days} days of production, how many total ${items} will be produced?

${name} runs ${a_worker} that produces ${per_session} ${items} per batch at ${his_her} manufacturing plant. It completes ${sessions} batches each day without fail. After ${days} days of operation, how many ${items} are produced in total?
